overview: "This 'Fitness Sluts' line has been a real challenge for me. I decided to build a full gym, since fitness is the new era of people - almost everybody goes to the gym, and many-many people have fantasies about girls doing fitness. I'm also a fitness addict, and for sure I do have the same fantasy, and that's the reason why I decided to do a movie, actually a line around this. I always think that people who love sports have a great connection with sex. Both really go together, and through this line I decided to pull out some of the current fantasies men have. I'm sure a lot of girls agree with this; probrably fitness girls will also love this line. All the the scenes are fantastic, but my preferred one is of course with Veronica Leal. She was unbelievable."  -Rocco Siffredi
title: Rocco's Fitness Sluts: DP Edition
